## PrintUtilities.printMessageInBox() method

Displays a message in the console wrapped in a box UI.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static printMessageInBox(message: string, terminal: ITerminal, boxWidth?: number): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The message to display.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

terminal


</td><td>

[ITerminal](./terminal.iterminal.md)


</td><td>

The terminal to write the message to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

boxWidth


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The width of the box, defaults to half of the console width.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
